column1: The Netherlands put on a masterful display to advance to the quarterfinals of Qatar 2022
column2: outplaying a spirited USA team. The Oranje used their experience and the guidance of their renowned coach to take advantage of the USA's inexperience
column3: scoring three times with Dumfries involved in each goal. The first was a classic example of Total Football
column4: and though the USA managed to score a goal in the second half
column5: the Netherlands ultimately earned their place in the quarterfinals.
